item.description:
@Hell_Hound_0516 wrote:

 if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("santa") && playerRights >=2)
        {
                addItem(1050,1);
        )

I tryed to add a simple command like that to my server… Im useing Project 16 V6 and every time i edit my client.java IT NEVER WORKS :mad:!!! What do i have to do to get that simple command working? I dont know why, and when you compile, what does it do?

Yeah sorry for all the questions… Im a newbie… lol
